verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> tested <S%H5254><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Abraham! <S%H85><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> I am."

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son, whom <S%H834><s%> you love, <S%H157><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Moriah; <S%H4179><s%> and offer <S%H5927><s%> him there <S%H8033><s%> as a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I will tell <S%H559><s%> you."

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and saddled <S%H2280><s%> his donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of his young <S%H5288><s%> men <S%H5288><s%> with him and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son; <S%H1121><s%> and he split <S%H1234><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him.
On the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> raised <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> from a distance. <S%H7350><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his young <S%H5288><s%> men, <S%H5288><s%> "Stay <S%H3427><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> with the donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and I and the lad <S%H5288><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> yonder <S%H5704><s%>; <S%H3541><s%> and we will worship <S%H7812><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to you."

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it on Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> and the knife. <S%H3979><s%> So the two <S%H8147><s%> of them walked <S%H1980><s%> on together. <S%H9191><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father and said, <S%H1><s%> "My father!" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H1><s%> I am, my son. <S%H559><s%>" And he said, <S%H2009><s%> "Behold, <S%H1121><s%> the fire <S%H559><s%> and the wood, <S%H2009><s%> but where <S%H784><s%> is the lamb <S%H6086><s%> for the burnt <S%H346><s%> offering <S%H7716><s%>?"

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> will provide <S%H7200><s%> for Himself the lamb <S%H7716><s%> for the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%>" So the two <S%H8147><s%> of them walked <S%H1980><s%> on together. <S%H9191><s%>

Then they came <S%H935><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him; and Abraham <S%H85><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and arranged <S%H6186><s%> the wood, <S%H6086><s%> and bound <S%H6123><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> him on the altar <S%H4196><s%> on top <S%H4605><s%> of the wood. <S%H6086><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> stretched <S%H7971><s%> out his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the knife <S%H3979><s%> to slay <S%H7819><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Abraham! <S%H85><s%>" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> I am."

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Do not stretch <S%H7971><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the lad, <S%H5288><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> nothing <S%H408><s%> <S%H3972><s%> to him; for now <S%H6258><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you fear <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> since you have not withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son, from Me."

Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> raised <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> [him] a ram <S%H352><s%> caught <S%H270><s%> in the thicket <S%H5442><s%> by his horns; <S%H7161><s%> and Abraham <S%H85><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> him up for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> of his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> Will Provide, <S%H7200><s%> as it is said <S%H559><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> "In the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> it will be provided. <S%H7200><s%>"
Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> a second <S%H8145><s%> time <S%H8145><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

and said, <S%H559><s%> "By Myself I have sworn, <S%H7650><s%> declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3282><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> and have not withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son,

indeed <S%H3588><s%> I will greatly <S%H1288><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you, and I will greatly <S%H7235><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and as the sand <S%H2344><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the seashore <S%H3220><s%>; <S%H8193><s%> and your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of their enemies. <S%H340><s%>

"And in your seed <S%H2233><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be blessed, <S%H1288><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> My voice. <S%H6963><s%>"

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his young <S%H5288><s%> men, <S%H5288><s%> and they arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> to Beersheba; <S%H884><s%> and Abraham <S%H85><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> at Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> that it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> has borne <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Nahor: <S%H5152><s%>
Uz <S%H5780><s%> his first-born and Buz <S%H938><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> and Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the father of Aram <S%H1><s%>
and Chesed <S%H3777><s%> and Hazo <S%H2375><s%> and Pildash <S%H6394><s%> and Jidlaph <S%H3044><s%> and Bethuel. <S%H1328><s%> "

And Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Rebekah: <S%H7259><s%> these <S%H428><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham's brother. <S%H251><s%>

And his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Reumah, <S%H7208><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Tebah <S%H2875><s%> and Gaham <S%H1514><s%> and Tahash <S%H8477><s%> and Maacah. <S%H4601><s%>
